summary: Adds a follower to Jorrvaskr called the Ghost of Ysgramor. Also adds a new blade that can be crafted with expensive items called the Blade of Ysgramor.
descriptionHtml:
I know some of you finished the companion questline, and even with the werewolf power, Wuuthrad was a little disappointing. This mod aims to fix that. It also adds a powerful follower called the Ghost of Ysgramor to Jorrvaskr. But the main feature is the new version of Wuuthrad, a powerful weapon called the Blade of Ysgramor. Using a Daedra heart, fifteen ebony ingots, 10 leather strips, Wuuthrad, and Ysgramor's skull, you can create a powerful blade with a base damage of 24, and a very powerful paralalysis enchantment. A high chance of paralyzing your enemies for five seconds, and a base damage of 24, what other weapon do you need. Ysgramor's skull can be found in the Arch-Mage's quarters.
Installation:
Just use the Nexus Mod Manager to download and activate the file. If you're not using NMM, just download it manually and put the .esp in your data folder, then activate it through the skyrim launcher, or through NMM if you use it but don't download with it


Changelog:
Version 1.2
-Added new custom texture for sword.
-Changed Ghost of Ysgramor to look like Ysgramor
-Added Ysgramor's skull to crafting recipe, found in Arch Mage Quarters
Version 1.1
-Changed description to match weapon
-Changed Ghost of Ysgramor to be actually ghostly
-Changed Ghost of Ysgramor to just carry a skyforge steel greatsword instead of the Blade of Ysgramor
-Changed Ghost of Ysgramor to look a little more like the Ysgramor met in Sovngarde.
Version 1.0
-Made the mod
author: TheWarlock117
